text: Videl is a character from the manga Dragon Ball created by Akira Toriyama. She appears in the Anime Dragon Ball Z and Dragon Ball Super. She is the only daughter of Mr. Satan. Later she becomes Son Gohan 's wife and mother of Pan. Her name is derived from the anagram of the English word "devil". == References == Category:Dragon Ball characters Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1993 Category:anime characters
title: Videl
